TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {216822=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015, 133273=28 July 2015, 133784=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 134491=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 218132=Gitanjali Gems is in the Diamond Cutting & Jewellery & Precious Metals sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 408.18 crore. The company management includes Mehul Choksi - Chairman & Managing Director, Nehal Modi - Non Executive Director, Dhanesh Sheth - Non Executive Director, Swaminathan Sundararajan Mittur - Independent Director, S Krishnan - Independent Director, Nazura Ajaney - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532715 and the NSE with an NSE Code of GITANJALI. Its Registered office is at A-1, 7th Floor, Laxmi Tower, Bandra - Kurla Complex,,Bandra (E) Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400051. Their Registrars are Karvy Computershare Private Ltd.}
